name: 2024 12th International Conference on Social Science and Humanity
content: Publication Information: Journal Publication Accepted and registered papers of ICSSH 2024 will be published in International Journal of Social Science and Humanity (IJSSH) Indexing: Google Scholar, Index Copernicus, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library ISSN: 2010-3646 Frequency: Bimonthly DOI: 10.18178/IJSSH
